item.description:
Moonrise Kingdom is the newest film from Wes Anderson. I missed it when it was in the multiplex this summer, so why not check it out at the Strand Theatre this week.

The plot: a young boy and girl meet at a summer camp and run off. Their parents, police, camp counselors, etc organize to find them. Stars Edward Norton, Bruce Willis, Francis McDormand, Bill Murray, Jason Schwartzman.

Let's meet outside the theater on Thursday at 6:45 for the 7 PM show. If you need to reach me, call or text my cell phone at 508-981-0455.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Moonrise Kingdom
